      int onPausePreview() 
      int onResumePreview() 
      int onStartPreview()
      通过UVC发出图指令 Starts capturing and drawing preview frames to the screen.
      Preview will not actually start until a surface is supplied
      with setFrameCallback(IFrameCallback) and If setFrameCallback(IFrameCallback) were called, IFrameCallback.onFrame(byte[]) will be called when preview data becomes available.

      参考通过USB-I2C/I2C命令发送出图命令【Send picture command via USB-I2C/I2C command】
      IRCMD.startPreview(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel, CommonParams.StartPreviewSource, int, CommonParams.StartPreviewMode, CommonParams.DataFlowMode)
      如果出现整帧数据都是红外数据，没有温度数据，可以尝试先停图再重新出图 部分模组例如mini384,会开启上电自动出图，固件中默认的分辨率是384*288,如果直接发送384*576的出图指令，会 出现384*576上下两部分都是红外数据的情况，所以需要先停图，再重新出图才可以
      int onStopPreview()
      通过UVC发停图指令 并非真正的停图，只是暂停出图，方便重新出图的时候快速出图
      Stops capturing and drawing preview frames to the surface, and resets the spi camera for a future call to onStartPreview() .

      参考通过USB-I2C/I2C命令发送停图命令【Send stop picture command via USB-I2C/I2C command】
      IRCMD.stopPreview(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel)
      int openUVCCamera(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel channel, java.lang.String spiDevice, int spiSpeed, int sensorFPS, CommonParams.SpiMode spiMode, int format, CommonParams.ProtocolInterface sensorMode, CommonParams.PreviewMode previewMode, CommonParams.DataFlowMode dataFlowMode)
      Open the spi device
      closeUVCCamera()

      byte[] readFrame()
      Called as preview frames are displayed
      if you want to all the function, Do not call setFrameCallback(IFrameCallback) and onStartPreview() before

        public void setDefaultBandwidth(float defaultBandwidth)

      • openUVCCamera

        public int openUVCCamera(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel channel,
                         java.lang.String spiDevice,
                         int spiSpeed,
                         int sensorFPS,
                         CommonParams.SpiMode spiMode,
                         int format,
                         CommonParams.ProtocolInterface sensorMode,
                         CommonParams.PreviewMode previewMode,
                         CommonParams.DataFlowMode dataFlowMode)
        Open the spi device
        closeUVCCamera()
        Parameters:
        channel -
        spiDevice - The spi device path
        spiSpeed - The spi master's clock frequency
        spiMode - the Slave sensor trigger the data's transmit mode
        CommonParams.SpiMode#SPI_MODE0,
        CommonParams.SpiMode#SPI_MODE1,
        CommonParams.SpiMode#SPI_MODE2,
        CommonParams.SpiMode#SPI_MODE3
        format -
        sensorMode -
        previewMode -
        Returns:

      • closeUVCCamera

        public int closeUVCCamera()
        close and release UVC camera Disconnects and releases the SPI Camera object resources.

        You must call this as soon as you're done with the SPI Camera object.


        Returns:

      • setFrameCallback

        public int setFrameCallback(IFrameCallback callback)
        register a callback to notify the frame data has been reached
        Parameters:
        callback -

      • onStartPreview

        public int onStartPreview()
        通过UVC发出图指令 Starts capturing and drawing preview frames to the screen.
        Preview will not actually start until a surface is supplied
        with setFrameCallback(IFrameCallback) and If setFrameCallback(IFrameCallback) were called, IFrameCallback.onFrame(byte[]) will be called when preview data becomes available.

        参考通过USB-I2C/I2C命令发送出图命令【Send picture command via USB-I2C/I2C command】
        IRCMD.startPreview(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel, CommonParams.StartPreviewSource, int, CommonParams.StartPreviewMode, CommonParams.DataFlowMode)
        如果出现整帧数据都是红外数据，没有温度数据，可以尝试先停图再重新出图 部分模组例如mini384,会开启上电自动出图，固件中默认的分辨率是384*288,如果直接发送384*576的出图指令，会 出现384*576上下两部分都是红外数据的情况，所以需要先停图，再重新出图才可以

      • onStopPreview

        public int onStopPreview()
        通过UVC发停图指令 并非真正的停图，只是暂停出图，方便重新出图的时候快速出图
        Stops capturing and drawing preview frames to the surface, and resets the spi camera for a future call to onStartPreview() .

        参考通过USB-I2C/I2C命令发送停图命令【Send stop picture command via USB-I2C/I2C command】
        IRCMD.stopPreview(CommonParams.PreviewPathChannel)
        Returns:

      • onPausePreview

        public int onPausePreview()
        Returns:

        public int onResumePreview()
        Returns:

      • onDestroyPreview

        public int onDestroyPreview()
        destroy UVCCamera object releases the SPI Camera object in JNI.

        You must call this as soon as you're done with the SPI Camera object.

        Returns:

      • readFrame

        public byte[] readFrame()
        Called as preview frames are displayed
        if you want to all the function, Do not call setFrameCallback(IFrameCallback) and onStartPreview() before
        Returns:
        a preview frame
